extendedInfo.description: Practice your ear, music theory and sight reading skills with this portable and easy-to-use training program. Perfect for students in introductory music theory courses.Challenge your abilities with the following exercises:-Note Identification-Generic Interval Identification-Chord Identification (FULL VERSION ONLY)-Major Key Signature Identification (FULL VERSION ONLY)-Specific Interval Identification (FULL VERSION ONLY)Customize with three different clef configurations:-Treble clef only-Bass clef only-Mixed clefsTrack your progress with a built-in grading system.Problems are randomly generated for depth of learning.Based on the exercises provided at http://www.musictheory.net

reviews.title: OK, but need to be able to replay note sounds
reviews.comment: I love the note identification but I wish I could replay the sound.  I take it this may be more geared towards identifying the notes based on the staff location, but I would like more to id them by sound.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good UI, straight forward,does exactly what it needs to. Great theory trainer! I bought the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Love the app. It\'s easy to follow and fun to look at. Great for beginners.  Just wish it had a play back button for the note.
reviews.author: Joy Scales

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Awesome app. Very helpful for practicing. I bought full version, @ less than $2 its completely worth it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Clumsy, unconfigurable, but looks nice.
reviews.comment: The interface is slow to move to the next question. It started being annoying within a minute of using the app. The interval identification challenge is something that competitors don\'t usually have, but too simple because it only does C-major.  At least the interface *looks* nice, but that doesn\'t compensate for the apps poor quality in other aspects.  Please try other apps, they are way better.
reviews.author: Arjen Kruithof
